snippet.title: Hunting Simulator 3 | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
🎯 Hunting Simulator 3 – The ultimate simulation for hunting enthusiasts is BACK!

Immerse yourself in the stunning natural landscapes of Colorado and Texas, where you can hunt over 40 animal species alone or with friends. Accompanied by your faithful hunting dog, experience the thrill of the hunt like never before.

With nearly 10 years of expertise in hunting games, NACON Studio Ghent delivers an authentic hunting experience in this third installment. Building on the success of the first two titles, enjoyed by over 1 million players, Hunting Simulator 3 introduces exciting new features:
🐾 SimFauna – A revolutionary dynamic system that faithfully replicates animal behavior and allows your actions to impact the environment.
🚗 Vehicles – Explore vast open-world environments more freely.
🎧 Enhanced sound design and improved hunting dog AI.
🌲 Powered by Unreal® Engine 5, enjoy breathtaking, realistic open worlds.

Gear up with equipment from top brands like Beretta®, Winchester®, and Browning®, and prepare for the most immersive hunting adventure yet!

Hunting Simulator 3 will be available on PlayStation®5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC!

Follow us: https://linktr.ee/huntingsim

-------------------------------
For news about our other games and products, you can also follow us on: 

Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/NaconGaming 
Instagram ► https://www.instagram.com/NaconGaming 
Twitter/X ► https://twitter.com/Nacon
TikTok ► https://tiktok.com/@nacon
